content.detailedDescription: I was doing fall tillage in my field one evening.  it was over thanksgiving week in 2013 and the temps were mild, with no discernible wind.  evening dusk arrives early and i wanted to finish a portion in my southeast field,  there was no moon that nite and a very dark sky.  at approx 7 p.M. i stopped my tractor to take a little break to eat a sandwich i prepared earlier. i remain seated in the tractor and grabbed my sandwich and then noticed a very bright blue light about two hundred feet to my right side.  i estimate the blue light or orb to be two feet of the ground and the orb being perfectly round.  i would guess the  orb was 5 foot in diameter. it was the most beautiful blue i had ever witnessed and was darker blue in the center and slowly refracted out to lighter blue on the edges.  hard to describe it and i remember just thinking,” gimme me a break”.  in the past i had witnessed other anomalies on the farm however nothing like this.  at this point i wasn’t nervous or frightened and just could not fathom what it was!   i looked away briefly and when i turned to observe it again it had disappeared.  where this happened on the farm was interesting to note,  as it is in a low area where anyone driving by would have not been able to see me working the field nor the orb.  til this day i wonder what it could have been or wanted.  thank you for letting me share my story.  curt
content.summary: Bright blue orb hovering when doing fall tillage

content.detailedDescription: Heading home from north brookfiled down route 67. saw man staring at the sky. looked up saw a large cigar shaped shaft. just hovering. my boyfriend couldn't stop the car in time. drove 3 seconds past it. backed up and it was gone with no evidence of being there or a flight path direction.
content.summary: Heading home from north brookfiled down route 67. saw man staring at the sky. looked up saw a large cigar shaped shaft feet above a farm. drove by, backed up, gone!

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of the 4th of july i was out front in my yard when i
noticed in the sw sky a very bright object relatively low in the
sky that at first was stationary. this occurred at night so the object
was much brighter than any star i've ever seen. it was completely
silent and then started to do zig-zag patterns in the sky coming to
a abrupt stop. then continued the pattern at what appeared to be
at extreme speed. i observed for about 5 min, not thinking to much
at the time about it and simply went back in my house.

i started doing some research months later after the subject came
up again and found that north east ohio and the great lakes in 
general seemed to be somewhat of a hot bed for sightings so i thought
it should be reported. note should be taken that this was not part
of any 4th of july fireworks show.
content.summary: Very bright object that stopped then zig-zagged then stopped quickly

content.detailedDescription: Went out to let  my dogs out back yard and seen 2 bright spheres circling my house. thinking why are those  helicopters around  my house? but as i listened i heard no noise. they desended as they circled to maybe 500 ft. then they left to the north i think. they took off at  very rate of speed. what scared me more than anything else was the dogs barked  and growled at them while i was watching. thinking something was watching me ,i ran in the house and locked the door. i called a friend of mine and he told me to report it on this  site.
content.summary: 2 shining lights circling  my house, desending then leaving to the north, at a high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: Walking dog turned north on crawford very bright oval streaked over house from southeast then lost sight behind another house.Oval was very large and very bright white below way below clouds
content.summary: Large luminous oval appeared southeast above house moving fast to north then behind house

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving from norristown heading to collegeville on ridge pike when i noticed three of these bright objects flying in a cross trajectory in front of us.I saw them as they were in direct path of my vision. my first instinct was these were ufos of some sort.We were both amazed as we have not seen objects of their shape glowing as intense as they were glowing before in the sky. we pulled over to observe when more objects became visible. all of the objects were flying at the same speed at different altitudes and with no apparent flight pattern. the best description we could give is they looked like glowing mushrooms or jellyfish. it was a strange and odd situation. we finally lost sight of the objects as they continued their flight path until local homes, treas and buildings obstructed our veiw. as we drove away on our continued route we saw two more flying on the same path from the same direction as the others in the sky. i lost sight of the last two as i had to focus my attention back on the road to drive in traffic.
content.summary: Over dozen bright dome/jellyfish shaped objects at different altitudes and distances flying at same speed and direction.

content.detailedDescription: I can't explain this .
content.summary: Morphing object reoccurance

content.detailedDescription: I lived in long beach ca 90802 at 1900 ocean apts 9th floor high rise on the beach. the queenm mzary is out my window. saw this and started taking pics..Wow!! i need to get these  valadared as real cuz im not crazy! "the more you know, the crazier you look".
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I lived on the 9th story high rise on beach 1900 ocean apts long beach ca. wittnessed out my window

content.detailedDescription: Going  out  to see friend in next apt when i saw  bright light above blg. prob  watched it for  5 mins . it stayed  still  then came lower the again rose and left to my right. don't know  what direction. maybe i just crazy....My dog  was howling as  i watched it.. weird.....
content.summary: Bright light over apt building  raising and lowering

content.detailedDescription:
In the very early hours of the morning on friday the 18th of september 2015 (approximately 12:20 am) i was laying in bed almost asleep, when i heard a strange noise that sounded exactly like what you'd imagine a ufo descending to a stop would sound like (or atleast what it's been said to sound like).

at that time i sprang out of bed, walked out the back door & stood on the pavement in my backyard looking vigorously up at the night sky for answers. about 15 minutes had elapsed and i couldn't see anything out of the ordinary (apart from a few lights that i thought appeared to be moving, may have just been stars) & although i was very intrigued - i decided to go back to bed.

i awoke the next morning to find something astonishing, something that has no logical explanation.

in the exact spot where i was standing on the pavement for those 15 minutes gazing up at the sky, a small bright circle has mysteriously appeared.

i live at home with my parents and i queried them about it that next day - neither of them had ever seen it before & they had not even the slightest idea as to where it had come from. it's still baffling us a few months later.

in my truly honest opinion i feel that there is no other reasonable explanation for the origin of this circle other than some sort of extraterrestrial involvement.

i think it's important to add that i live in a quiet neighbourhood, my backyard is quite small & is fully fenced, therefore i don't believe it's plausible to suggest that somebody 'snuck in' during the night to make this circle.(and for what reason would someone want to do that for anyway). 


i have attached 2 pictures of the circle-

the first picture was taken just after it happened & the second picture was taken just recently.

i'm hoping to get some tests done on the circle in the near future to determine whether it has any radioactive properties, but haven't had the chance to do so yet.

thank you for reading.
content.summary: Almost asleep when i heard strange whirling noise, went outside to investigate. next morning bright circle on pavement in backyard where i was standing night before.

content.detailedDescription: Jus me and a friend of mine i haven't seen in a while night fishing we observed a bright whiteish light coming down towards us it hit the water with no splash at all i felt a vibration it changed color took a straight path then started turning my phone froze turned white and shut off my phone was wouldn't stop vibrating we was so scared n shocked we jus stood their no movement it just zoomee through the water like you would play with a toy under water no splash the lights the vibration it wasn't that far from us i felt like i could feel it i'm still shaking typing this
content.summary: If i had a word to describe it would be speechless never thought it would be me witnessing this shi+

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting outside the bar and grill yesterday's in support of a fundraiser event for a recently deceased friend.  there were a number of people outside but i was sitting by myself, not engaged with anyone.  looking at night sky as i do and spotted to my left in the south western sky, a set of four white blinking lights in an alternating pattern.  it was moving slowly then stopped and hovered.  another set of same lights just appeared on the same horizontal plane as the first with similar blinking sequential white lights.  both hovered for approximately five minutes.  all potential witnesses were drinking and having loud conversations.  no one else saw.  didn't think to pull out my cell phone for video.
content.summary: 1 set of sequential lights moved in, hovered and then another same just appeared to the left.

content.detailedDescription: I have seen things in the sky and sometimes its hard to just let go, i am a mom, and i don't know if finding out the answers to things is actually worth the risk. so if you guys cant reassure that i'm not crazy, please delete this and do not contact me. i do not feel safe about this at all.
content.summary: I dont know if i can trust you guys

content.detailedDescription:
After dinner i was out walking my poodle on our back road. unusually clear i was looking upward in hopes of catching a early geminid meteor. i had just observed a satellite on a near polar orbit, but slightly more westerly then usual. i lost sight of it over my northern horizon. i swung my eyesight to the west when i noticed three dim and orange like objects traveling at high speed toward slightly south of my zenith in a east south east direction estimated 110 to 120 degrees. they were traveling very fast from horizon to horizon in close to 5 seconds. their color appeared orangeish to me as if their speed colliding with atoms in the atmosphere produced some glow but the craft themselves appeared cool, and silent. most noticeably was that no sonic boom was generated. that is a little spooky.
they seemed to really slice through our atmosphere. all though they were in a triangle formation, the southerly craft was wavering slightly from the others. very slightly as if it was a routine flight, if piloted the controller was feeling the stick a little. this was my thought, all though i am still tingling a little knowing some things about physics and these craft were defying the laws of nature with their high speed silent travel. i so hope somebody else saw them. in 2008, i reported a perfectly rectangular green glowing object descending slowly and to the west on hwy 97 south of toppenish washington where i was returning home. that experience has really stuck with me being such a mystery. being an astronomer i've always believed that if there was an advanced type of beings that we accidently see for what ever reason from time to time near and around us that they've been right here all along. advanced and multidimensional, but still it's just to far to travel from star to star. stuck here like we are, but very advanced. or those were military objects in my sky tonight. much too fast. they were as real as anything. i don't understand. i hope someone saw them. i will never forget this experience, and the 2008 experience. both now very heavy on my mind.
content.summary: Three dim and orangeish objects flying high speed and altitude flying east south east in a triangular formation.

content.detailedDescription: Went to the grocery store and noticed this in the sky. i have no idea if it's just a cloud/weather anomaly or if it is really something there. i took a pic but didn't stay and watch.
content.summary: Ufo or weather anomaly?

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work at around 17:20 on tuesday december 8th 2015. i was in the front passenger seat. we were heading west on clark dr. i turned in my seat to hand my child snacks in the back passenger seat. as i was turned i saw a big bright blue orb in the sky almost directly above the vehicle. it looked very like a planet, like venus or mars when they are visible only much larger and brighter. it was very high up and could not have been attached to anything like a building or other man made structure. i thought maybe it would move but it stayed perfectly where it was. i watched it as we drove about 4 blocks and as we turned right onto 1st ave. i watched it once we turned. as soon as we passed the first tallish building on 1st ave and it blocked my view of the sky, i tried to crane around and keep an eye on it. when we passed the building it was gone. i looked every direction for it and it was no where. as we got to commercial drive where there would be a better vantage point as it is higher elevation and has lower buildings, i got a good view in every direction of the sky and it was not there.
content.summary: Large bright ball, like a star but much larger and brighter. then it vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
This is just one video i have . the object is traveling at extreme speed and maneuvers 
around power and cable wires .
content.summary: Fly and monewvers through power and cable wires.

content.detailedDescription: My 16 yr old called me into his bedroom to check out a star he was watching out his bedroom window.  he asked me if i thought it was a star or a satelite?  as i watched it with him it sparatically moved!  downward and back up! i said wait a minute!  he said ok so u saw that?  then it did it again in a direction like to make the letter l. then it moved again like a number 7.  i ran to get the binoculars and he tried to focus them but then the bright object was gone!  then my son said there it is!!  it's right there and it's the shape of a triangle!  it was at the tree tops next to my house.  i ran to the backyard and it went right by my house.  i thought it was a plane be cuz it sounded like a jet and it had a red light on one side and blue on the other. and white lites in the back.  but a plane could not fly so low right above the tree tops.  then i heard a lot of noise in the woods like a pack of animals running.  i went in house and locked doors.  i am not sure what this was.  i would like to know if anyone else saw this?  maybe animals ran scared? coincidence?
content.summary: Looked like a star in sky that was moving in sparatic fast strange way caught our attention.  it then disappeared and showed up at tree tops.  triangular in shape .  sounded like a jet thought it could have been a plane customers of blur red n white light

content.detailedDescription:
I am an it professional, this week i enrolled in a online training and its starting @4:45 am, this morning around 6:05am pst i heard a noise like a fitter plan sound, initial i ignored this but sound increased so i looked outside from window and saw one plane shape object(with colored light) in sky but that was not moving and then i went to the baloney and saw one sparking light i zoomed my camera and that was in round shape(you may look in video & photo).  just due to curiosity i am submitting you guys because i am unable to identify that.
 
thank you
content.summary: Object with sparking light & round shape

content.detailedDescription: I was at the beach checking out the waves. this area is well know for some sightings but some have come close to this in another area. i felt shaky after i saw that comment cause i was confused. i was flabbergasted. the object was an oval shape and continued to hover in the south direction then moved north at a high velocity of speed. never seen anything excel so fast in my life. ~jed
content.summary: This oval shaped object hovered over the beach for 2 minuets or so and then took off north of marquette

content.detailedDescription: As usual, walked outside to view the night sky. while looking east i observed a bright orb approx 25-35 miles away. during the viewing i observed a obvious fixed wing aircraft passing beyond the orb leaving a con-trail. the plane was approx. 5-10 miles beyond the orb. watched object for several minutes then went inside. came back out i little later and orb was gone. there's a lot of ah-64s that use this airspace and being a retired us marine, i'm familiar with all aircraft in the world. was unlike anything i've seen before. semper fidelis.
content.summary: Upon further research sighting could have possibly been venus but have been here long time and never seen in the past .

content.detailedDescription: It happened a while ago, i knew about ufo before and i started to look up and i started to see a white object moving up and down in the skies. i looked at it closely, i could tell that it wanted me to go away. my hand started to move  uncontrollably. it then sent 1 object in the  skies, it had glowing lights, the next object it sent at me looked like the british fight that could land vertically but this object had risen up then came over my house, the strange thing there is only a army base in my town and not a air force base. the next object was like the first object, it seemed to me as if they were setting up a play. the last object was a triangular shape and it had red and white lights on it, it hovered over my house. for some strange reason it felt as if it was normal at first then i realised it was a ufo space ship. after that i went to my bother he thought i was crazzy. the end of this event, i can tell you about the time there was a gap in time, really strange.
content.summary: It was the weirdest thing that had happened to me til that point.

content.detailedDescription:
For the sake of the story and the privacy of the people involved, we will refer to my two friends who co-witnessed the experience by the aliases of kelly (female- roommate/friend) and huin (male-roomate/vietnamese student). 

the sighting around 10:30 pm mid-late may 2015

it was a peaceful night; clear may sky, the busy suburb was quiet and the weather temperate. kelly, huin and myself were all standing in the backyard talking while kelly and i had a cigarette. we had been standing up against the wall underneath the roofs 2ft overhang talking for about 10 minutes when i began to admire the clear sky and radiant starlight. as i leaned on my left foot the sky beyond the roof overhang became revealed to me. i immediately noticed an anomaly with what at first appeared to be a single star but inevitably could only be classified as a ufo. i asked kelly if she saw what i saw and she was immediately in awe and agreement that what i was seeing was actually happening. excited and amazed we both asked huin if he saw what we were seeing. in broken english he said, "what is that? why's that star moving?" i said do you see that, that's not a star. he replied, "yes it is, it's a star but why is it moving like that?" kelly and i tried to explain to him that stars didn't move like that which meant it was something else, he agreed with the fact that stars didnt move like that but he could not fathom it being anything but a star that was moving unnaturally. the one thing we all could agree on was that it wasn't normal and that we had never seen anything like it. we stared and watched together for about 45 minutes.

the light was fluttering in the sky almost as if it were a stationary bumble bee, sporadically moving in different directions and at different velocities with no visible or consistent rate of acceleration. this movement would take place from anywhere between 5 and 20 seconds before the object would become idle and appear completely still just like a star. 

after 45 minutes of viewing this event huin pointed out that there were other lights in the sky acting the same. at first i didnt believe it but then i looked around and there were around 5-6 of them in the sky all spread out at a distance almost evenly throughout a 360 degree perimeter. its kind of like we were surrounded. to an unobservant eye the lights looked like stars and therefore the distances i are unclear but it could have been our area of the city that was surrounded or it could have been the city itself. the light appeared steady bright white but when you focused your sight intently you could randomly see a quick blue light flicker but not constantly, it was really hard to tell from the distance we were at but kathy and i both saw it. at one point and only once the sky lit up really quickly, it was almost like a quick flash and it was the sky above us, it did not effect the area around us and you could only see it if you were staring upwards at that exact millisecond.

after viewing for around an hour and with no sign of the ufos leaving or changing pattern, huin decided to go inside and get some sleep for work. kathy and i remained outside for another half hour to an hour and everything that followed has challenged my intelligence, psyche, reality and everything i know and understand.

everything that i'm about to say from here on out may sound unbelievable but i assure you of my sanity, i promise that i am in no way making any of this up. this is in no way a fabrication, it happened! i have performed hours of research and tried to reason with myself and make excuses for what was experienced. i've tried to credit certain occurrences to coincidence and the possibility of my subconscious playing around with me but it's all way to coincidental and when you put it all together as a sequence of events it does in fact seem very strange.

the evening gets weirder
i pulled my cellphone out of my pocket to try and take a video, when i pulled it out the screen was on, the phone wasnt locked with my password, the screen was in the text message app. the weirdest thing about it was the fact that it had recorded parts of our conversation by way of the talk to text option however the  microphone wasn't even visible on screen like when that option is normally in use. kathy and i began to talk to the phone as if we were talking to someone, it continued recording selectively what i said, kathy tried interrupting but this time it did not record her participation in the conversation. after 45 seconds i stopped talking. kathy then began talking and like the first part of the conversation that was recorded in my pocket, it was now recording her again. she talked for 20 seconds and then the strangest part of this story happened. she asked the phone, "what are you doing here? are you...Are you" it recorded every word just like that and then i interrupted, "listening?" i said. it did not record me. kathy stared for a couple seconds and then said, "here?" it did not record her but instead the word that immediately popped up was the last word i said, "listening". it was like the phone was talking to us and just told us that it was listening. this has never happened again, my screen was password locked, the voice recode icon in the text message wasn't even visible, it was just a screen with no keyboard or microphone bit selective words being recorded with an eerie message that whoever was there in the sky that night was listening. i've tried to tell my self it was coincidence but it was just too weird and i will never forget it.

while we were occupied with the text message screen we had gone into the house but kathy and i are both adventurous and strong minded people so we went back outside to see if the lights were still there. it is now about 12am-1am and the lights were still in the sky, fluttering sporadically. it was silent out, pure silence. suddenly kathy and i heard a rustling in the tall cedar hedges. first too the right then too the left, then in front of us. the rustling continued randomly in all directions. i told kathy that it must be raccoon or squirrels. i looked in the bushes but i couldn't see anything i made noises to try and scare the potential critter(s) but we heard nothing run off and the noises persisted but then stopped. this was about 1-2 minutes. we both then began to hear what sounded like footprints in the grass. kathy said, "do you hear that?" i stared at her and for the first time all night had a weird and creepy feeling take over my body. i looked at her and said, "lets go inside now" we both agreed immediately and went back in the house. we went upstairs to my room and looked out the window, you could still hear rustling and movement through the grass and bushes. after about 30 seconds we heard a dog. it was a loud yelp of a dog in pain. for anyone who's ever heard this before, you know that it's usually a constant and the dog persists until the owner intervenes however this was one excruciatingly loud scream that stopped abruptly after about 3 seconds a lost as if the dog was dead. directly following the yelp was a symphony of howling and barking dogs all around the the entire area. i've never heard anything like it, it was the far range and qty of dogs barking that was especially memerable. the barking went on for around a minute and then calmed instantly.

the last time i looked out the window it was around 1:30am and the lights were still there. the next 3 nights i looked for them but the sky was always overcast. i've witnessed that light again but only one was there, not all of them; it had the same distinct random flutter. 

after much research and time to think about things i have concluded only that those lights were ufos and that a series of strange coincidences followed. i also believe that there were strange incidents that may be involved leading up to this event including the day before and other stuff going back as far as a couple weeks. following the day of the event there were other strange occurrences that took place and still continue to take place including a heightened sense of intuition and psychic phenomena, sleep paralysis and a 45 minute time loss experienced during l by myself and another person on december 4th 2015 while driving a set time and distance from midland, ontario to courtice, ontario. something weird happened and strange things continue to happen and not just to me but to others around me. i've contemplated the possibility of this being insanity, coincidence, ive looked at logical solutions and thought about subconscious reasoning but other people have experienced these things with me. i've thought about the power of suggestion but i didn't even think about some of this stuff until the other person pointed it out to me. weird stuff has been happening and whatever it is that's happened, i believe in it. whatever it is.
content.summary: Strange fluttering lights, cellphone anomaly and weird occurrences following

content.detailedDescription: I'm stood in my back garden and i can see six lights in the sky in a sort of diamond pattern, they're not in a tree or a crane. my brain is telling me they're stars as they haven't moved for about 45 minutes. the thing is they're all green. all i can find on the internet is that green stars don't exist and i'm hoping you can shed some light on what i'm seeing, because it's bugging me. sorry for the poor quality photo, it was taken with my iphone
content.summary: Sorry i don't know where else to to go

content.detailedDescription: I'm stood in my back garden and i can see six lights in the sky in a sort of diamond pattern, they're not in a tree or a crane. my brain is telling me they're stars as they haven't moved for about 45 minutes. the thing is they're all green. all i can find on the internet is that green stars don't exist and i'm hoping you can shed some light on what i'm seeing, because it's bugging me. sorry for the poor quality photo, it was taken with my iphone
content.summary: Sorry i don't know where else to to go

content.detailedDescription: I filmed 5 to 6 slowly moving, hovering lights over the westbank of new orleans on 11/28/15 at 6 15 pm.  there is a plane that flies directly overhead and it can be seen, the blinking wing lights, and heard.  the lights that i watched, and cell phone filmed for about 5 minutes, made no sound.
content.summary: New orleans lights in the sky 11/28/15

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were grilling on the back deck and he noticed some lights in the night sky that were moving irradictly. we watched them go forward and backward up and done all while changing from red lights and green lights it also changed the amount of lights there would be three red lights and then four green lights! it moved all over the sky and continued to change direction and color and amount of lights. my oldest son also came outside and saw these lights! i recorded a small portion of the sighting on my iphone it didn't come out as good as seeing it but you can see it change color out of nowhere and you can see no other lights that are typical in planes which fly over all the time. usually planes having a flashing white light and there was none of that as well as the odd direction changes!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red and green lights in the clear night sky, changing direction and patterns of light!

content.detailedDescription: Around 8:00 pm last night (12-10-15) my mother and i were outside looking at the stars when we noticed what looked to be a sphere like object in the sky north of olean, ny. in person, this thing was huge! it looked like the quintessential "flying saucer." this object appeared to be spinning with blinking red and yellow lights. this object hoovered in the air for about five minutes and then slowly drifted south. i attempted to get this on video but my phone does not record the best quality videos in the dark. however, i am attaching my video to this thread anyway. when observing the video you can see the circular outline of this object through three blinks lights that slowly form. unfortunately, my phone was unable to capture the red blinking lights that were on the object as well. please be aware that we were so startled by what we saw that there is some minor offensive language in the video. thank you!
content.summary: Around 8:00 pm last night (12-10-15) my mother and i were outside looking at the stars when we noticed what looked to be a sphere like object in the sky north of olean, ny. in person, this thing was huge! it looked like the quintessential "flying saucer."

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from friends. i noticed what looked like a cloud on fire. i thought it might be a light shines from ground but i kept observing it and it went from what looked like a burning cloud in sky to a bright yellow light. i exited off interstate so i could take overpass. i started recording video on cell phone when i was on top of overpass so i could get a higher view without any obstructions. my phone was damp or dirty and made video hazy and all the streetlights and the object look hazy but you can tell where it is. there was no planes or anything in sky at that time. the object was much closer than the video made it look. i continued to record but phone battery was dying and i stopped so i could turn and get on a road that was darker so i could get another video. while i turned to get in head on direction with object it de-intensified and suddenly was gone and i didn't have time to get another video.
content.summary: Started out like a cloud on fire and ended up a bright object.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i stopped on a hill station to take some pictures.
2.I came to know about the object when i saw it in the photo.
3.It is feeling like an ufo in which the direction is seen below it through the smoke coming from it.
4.All the motions are seen in the picture.
5.It was very strange to see this and i cant believe this as science does not allow us to believe on it. i had shown it to friends and they thought the same.
content.summary: I have captured an ufo in my mobile. there are two photos i have taken out of which one has the ufo. it looks like it is coming from behind the mountains. please help me in finding about the information.
